en.step1: Hi! Welcome to the Clash Royale Card Maker!
en.step2: This is the 'Create' section. Here you can create and edit your cards.
en.step3: This is the 'Cards' section. Here you can view and edit the cards that you saved.
en.step4: This is the 'Info' section. Here you can read info about the CRCM and donate me some money :P
en.step5: When you're done with your card, press here to save, download or share it with your friends!
en.step6: You're ready to get started, enjoy! :)
